name: LD49 - Senatus
description:
Save the Roman Empire from destruction with mini-games.
Manage every problem of the empire until you take a well deserved break at 476 AD.

You only need your mouse AND your keyboard.

05/10

Very minor changes patch:

  • a small UI change (only 1 text fix, no new asset)
  • a light offset for the starting position of the character
